programme.desc: Farid adalah lelaki kutu buku yang selalu dibuli oleh Syakirin, seniornya. Farid bertekad untuk memasuki kejohanan MMA yang dianjurkan oleh universiti mereka supaya dapat diakhiri oleh Syakirin.

programme.title: Pee Nak 2

programme.title: Zhong Liu Ji Shui Ep14
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Chiang Li Ping plays a scorned wife, while Elaine Chin Yen Ling is the mistress who teaches the hypocritical husband that what goes around, comes around.

programme.title: Moods of Love
programme.desc: How far would you go for love? Or lust? These are the questions posed in two, sinfully entertaining Sung Dynasty tales that comprise this film.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Legendary director Chang Cheh teams Alexander Fu Sheng and 'Venoms' Lo Meng and Kuo Chue in an exciting tale of a kung fu blacksmith.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: After a young mother and her husband die, one child is sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Martial arts star Jimmy Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who unites with his wife Kan to battle kidnappers at the Red Lotus Temple.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: A pair of female martial artists end up banding together to go up against the evil Black Demon. Starring Cheng Pei Pei.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: The court intrigues, politicking, bickering and backstabbing continues in this sequel to The Empress Dowager. Starring Lisa Lu.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Wong Yue and Gordon Liu star in this entertaining 'hopping vampire' action comedy.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Alongside the equally famous Lo Lieh, superstar David Chiang plays noble warrior monk Chih Shim, the monk who saved the Southern Shaolin Temple.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: 5 Shaolin rebels train hard in order to successfully defeat their Manchu enemies. Starring David Chiang, Ti Lung, Alexander Fu.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: What starts off as a musical romp turns into something more akin to a Shakespearean tragedy than a beach-babe party. Starring Ching Li.

programme.title: Oath of Death
programme.desc: When Sung Dynasty patriot Chin Liang runs afoul of a corrupt acquaintance, he is forced to avenge the villain's treachery via a self-sacrificing oath.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: After a guilty Alex confesses his affair to Tung, his injured wife, she somehow ends up living with Alex's mother and his mistress under the same roof!

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: After a master passes on his magical weapon to his top student, a jealous rival goes and kidnaps the man's fiance.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, director Lo Wei plays a fishing village bully, whose son lusts after a local beauty.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: From writer director Pan Lei comes this Chinese variation of Henry King's famous 1950's film about a persecuted swordsman.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: A young couple lived happily in a house but the woman becomes haunted after she accidentally kills her husband.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: As the aggressive Chin Empire conquers the Chao Kingdom and drains the Wei empire, adventure, intrigue and tragedy abound as the armies march into battle.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Directed by Chow Sze Loke and Li Han Hsiang, this classic starring Diana Chang, Chang Chung and Pai Yun depicts how Lotus Pan marries a midget, yet has an affair.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: When Fang returns from the U.S. to see Rose but starts eyeing her old friend's fiance, Rose shows that she has a thorny side.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays a beauty tricked into sacrificing herself for the good of the Chinese people. However, the truth is revealed too late.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: Veteran director Yen Chun excels in this tale of the Dragon Sword and the evil Security Agency, beautiful swordswomen and bandits who want it.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: Betty Loh, Grace Ting and Diana Chang star in this romantic comedy between a gifted scholar and the administrative official's daughter he falls for at first sight.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: Veteran Yueh Feng made this 'Martial Arts World' saga of a masked master of the 'Black Sand Hand Technique,' starring Lily Ho in a dual role.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This drama takes on a group of young people who get entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: This tragic tale depicts the life of Fang Pi Yu, a singer whose husband dies in his attempt to free her from her past, and whose father-in-law throws her out.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: This Yuan Dynasty tale tells of the Sacred Fire sect, Wu Tang clan, O Mei's disciples, a sacred book, and the destruction of Shaolin.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Be tickled by the slippery efforts of three pickpockets, so adept at their chosen skill that they even manage to fleece three beauties of their underwear!

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: Director Derek Yee reproduces a 40-year old masterpiece & garners five HKFA award nominations for it. This dazzler stars Lin Geng Xin, Peter Ho & Jiang Yi Yan.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Shot in Malaysia, this action comedy starring Eliza Sam, Joyce Cheng & Jeana Ho sees six female police recruits developing a bond as they bust crime in bikinis.

programme.title: Ready o/r Knot
programme.desc: A couple who first meet at a wedding & have been together for five years, question the institution of marriage from opposing viewpoints. Should marriage always be the 'next step.'?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Vanguard, a covert private security, is tasked with protecting an accountant targeted by deadly mercenaries. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: This award-winning film delves into same-sex relationships with its depiction of the romance between two women in Macau. Starring Gigi Leung, Fish Liew & Jennifer Yu.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: This wildly popular Korean comedy stars Kim Ah Jung & Ju Jin Mo in the story of a talented but overweight girl, who undergoes extensive plastic surgery to become a slender bombshell.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Helmed by four Best Actors and set in Hong Kong in the 1970s, this exciting action film charts how the ICAC dealt with corruption within the police force in its early stages of establishment.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Beautiful Jade, a charming yet feisty royal bodyguard, is happily married to scholar Sean until Muse sneaks into her life to sabotage her marriage and country.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: HKFA Best Actor, Tony Leung Ka Fai, stars & directs this charming human drama set against a diner that opens till the wee hours - where compassion is always on the menu.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: The Sinking City : Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people fight for their ideal lifestyles as they share a small living space called "Space Capsule". Starring Pakho Chao, Louis Cheung & Andrew Lam.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: When a bribery trial is delayed after the defendant absconds & only witness goes missing, the ICAC launches a full-scale operation to track them down.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Tasked to protect the community from monsters, a mystic monk has to seek divine intervention when the Emperor abruptly dies, and dark forces threaten the world!

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: A demon sealed by a Taoist medium in a fish is released when a group of kids catches the demon fish and brings it home.

programme.title: Weeds on Fire
programme.desc: This award-winning film reveals the true story of Hong Kong's first youth baseball team, who miraculously defeats a powerful rival to become champions

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Superstar Andy Lau stars as a bomb specialist set on capturing a wanted criminal called Blast in this action-drama. However, will he be able to do it in time when Blast threatens a massacre?

programme.title: Cook Up a Storm
programme.desc: Nicholas Tse & Jung Yong Hwa helm this blockbuster filmed in Guangzhou, Macau & Europe, about a Cantonese cook who takes on a Michelin-starred rival for a prestigious title.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: Starring Zhou Dong Yu & Joseph Chang, this comedy depicts a young man falling in love with a girl who only eats nail clippers!

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: Scripted and produced by Tsui Hark, this fantasy film depicts a group of warriors protecting the world from a monster invasion. Starring Zhou Dong Yu, Aarif Lee & Ni Ni.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: David Ki was a top rock climber in Asia - until an accident left him wheelchair bound. With unyielding courage and tenacity, David is back to scaling dizzy heights and conquering Lion Rock!

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: Directed by Dante Lam and starring Zhang Yi, Huang Jing Yu & Du Jiang, this military saga depicts a Chinese naval commando unit that intercepts terrorists to save Chinese citizens in Yemen.

programme.title: Grounded for Christmas
programme.desc: When a winter storm hits Cleveland and grounds flights, Nina and her fellow pilot find themselves stuck attending holiday events together. But an unlikely romance soon blossoms.

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: In this glittering satire of social class and the pain of growing up, Emma must adventure through misguided matches and romantic missteps to find the love that has been there all along.

programme.title: Come Away
programme.desc: Highly creative origin story of Peter Pan and Alice In Wonderland as siblings who, trying to save their parents from despair, choose between home and imagination.

programme.title: The Lake House
programme.desc: A doctor and architect fall in love through letters and realise that they are living in the same house during different periods.

programme.title: E.T.
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic tells the story of how a little boy tries to help a stranded alien return home when it is accidentally left stranded on Earth.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: Two female friends with very different ideals decide to start a beauty company together. One is more practical, while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys
programme.desc: Sent back to 1984 to protect a resistance leader's mother, a soldier finds himself in an unfamiliar past with unlikely allies, new enemies and a new mission.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: A brilliant medical engineer and a veteran astronaut go on a seemingly routine spacewalk that ends up in a huge disaster.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: 30-something Mike O'Donnell is given a second shot at life when he is miraculously transformed back to the age of 17.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: When the King falls ill, Shrek has to find and train an heir apparent while Princess Fiona fends off Prince Charming's advances.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes must once again face their mortal enemy Cobra while contending with threats within the government.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, serving an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed but this time it's personal.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan directs an exceptional cast in this sci-fi action film that travels around the globe and into the intimate and infinite world of dreams.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A bank robber must navigate a dangerous series of complications to get out of the game.

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: When detective John Shaw uncovers evidence linking his fellow officers to a murder, they frame him for a homicide he didn't commit.

programme.title: Brahms: the Boy II
programme.desc: Unaware of the terrifying history of Heelshire Mansion, a young family moves into a guest house on the estate where their young son soon makes an unsettling new friend.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two best friends find themselves in a no-holds-barred battle when a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates for the same wedding venue.

programme.title: Zathura: a Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class...

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri sees ghosts and crazy things happen to the people around her. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: The Map Against the World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: the Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: Where the Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Right before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. As the two roam around in Seoul, they start to discover a different side to each other that they had never seen.

programme.title: Chronicle of a Blood Merchant
programme.desc: Set in the 1960's after the Korean War, a couple is happily married for 11 years until a rumor spreads around the village that the man isn't the real father of their eldest son......

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto

programme.title: Sunny
programme.desc: A group of girlfriends once inseparable in their teens reunite years later when they realize one of them is terminally ill.

programme.title: On Your Wedding Day

programme.title: Love+Sling

programme.desc: An arrogant top star and a fussy screenwriter, a meddling chef and a homeless flight attendant, a deaf composer and TV drama producer. They learn to navigate the modern dating world via social media.

programme.title: Feng Shui
